articles.title: Tarid Wongvorachan
articles.contents:
Tarid Wongvorachan
          
          
          Blog
          About
          
          
          
          
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Tarid Wongvorachan
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        CV
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Bio
            Hi! Welcome to my blog on psychometric, data science, and
            tidbits about my academic lives!
            I am Tarid, a doctoral student in the the
            Measurement, Evaluation, and Data Science program at the
            University of
            Alberta.
            As a researcher (or someone who tries to be), my primary
            area of interest is in the usage of quantitative methods to
            address research problems in educational measurement and
            other social issues pertaining to social science.
            Be that as it may, I also seek to use qualitative and
            mixed methods research skills whenever it makes sense to
            understand social phenomena from another perspective as
            well. I have also been learning to use tools in data science
            such as data mining, machine learning, and natural language
            processing to gain insights at a broader perspective with
            large-scale data.
            I hope by sharing what I learned (and rant about what I
            encountered), I could provide some food for thoughts for you
            readers and potentially inspire some of you along the line
            in what you are doing.
            Thank you for visiting!
            
            
            Hobbies
            Video games!: I play lots of games
            on Nintendo switch and PC, Skyrim, the Witcher 3, Left4Dead
            2, the Legend of Zelda, Super Mario, JRPGs, you name
            it!
            Strolling outdoor : Sometimes when
            the weather is nice, I like to stroll outside without a plan
            and let my thoughts flow freely for once.
            Memeing: I pride myself as a meme
            lord with my criminally twisted humor. Try me!
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Tarid Wongvorachan
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                      LinkedIn
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      CV
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      GitHub

articles.title: Xiang Guo
articles.contents:
Tarid Wongvorachan
          
          
          Blog
          About
          
          
          
          
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Xiang Guo
          
          
            
              Raised in New Jersey by two lawyers, I am now an
              aspiring data artist and competitive rock climber. I moved
              to Seattle to fly floatplanes, but I got caught up in the
              startup world. Send me a WhatsApp message if you have good
              turnip prices.
